DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment guided also by ICP mean wave amplitude improves outcome compared to international standard care in patients with SAH.
DOC.brief_title: ICP Versus Intracranial Compliance Guided Management in SAH
DOC.detailed_description: In this study SAH-patients are randomized to treatment based on international standard care (ICP/CPP guided therapy) or intracranial compliance (ICP mean wave amplitude) guided therapy in addition to ICP/CPP guided therapy. Main outcome variables are survival and neurological outcome after 3 and 12 months.
DOC.criteria: Subarachnoid hemorrhage, acute Intracerebral pressure monitoring device inserted Exclusion criteria: No intracranial pressure monitoring Age < 18 years
